description: Minimalist by design, the Nodin’s simplicity expands its versatility. It starts as your go-to for light protection on daylong hikes, then becomes your go-to for everything else – the jacket that lives on that hook by the door, always ready. The Tyono™ nylon balances wind protection with breathability, and a PFC-free DWR treatment sheds light moisture. It packs into its pocket, and a low-profile StowHood™ adds protection, adjusts with a single pull, and zips into the collar when not in use.
name: Arcteryx Nodin Jacket - Mens
